text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: She's not my big sis for nothing.

Narita Brian and Biwa Hayahide are on separate, but equally exciting, 
paths within the Twinkle Series.

If they were to race against each other, there's no telling who'd come 
out on top.

The first half of the Twinkle Series ends with Biwa Hayahide's 
tremendous victory in the Takarazuka Kinen.

Now with summer here, Team Sirius goes shopping to prepare for 
summer camp.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Let's see, there's fireworks, watermelon, carrots… Aaah, we've got so 
much to buy!

Prepping for the camp is hard, but we'll have a chance to stretch our 
legs once we get there. It's a training camp, but this is also a vacation 
for us.

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text: Oh! It's Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Wow, it's really her! It was so amazing to see you win the Derby with 
that five-length lead!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Thanks…

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Next up is the third crown, the Kikuka Sho, right? Are you gonna race 
the Arima Kinen after that?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, I was wondering that too! Well, Trainer?!
Nothing's set in stone yet, but I'm thinking that'll be the schedule.
Nothing's set in stone yet, but I'm thinking that'll be the schedule.

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! Seeing you take the Triple Crown and go on to win the Arima 
Kinen would be amazing! We're counting on you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't have to tell me. I'm going to win all my races.

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! I'm gonna go with my family! We can't wait to see your big 
win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Everyone is confident in her victory. Brian deserves nothing less.

I can't fathom her losing at this point. Not the Kikuka Sho nor the 
Arima Kinen.
Though depending on her opponents, things might get shaken up.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But who could win against her?
Oh? Well, if it isn't Brian.
Isn't that…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
She's Hishi Amazon, the leader of Miho dorm. Doing a little 
shopping, Amazon?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, the juniors aren't goin' home for summer, so I thought I'd make 
a little treat for them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're quite the overbearing pack mother.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Heh, taking care of people isn't just about feeding 'em.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I set an example on the track too. Whoever you face, you can take 
'em on if you've got the guts!

It sounds like Hishi Amazon's got the same never-fail attitude as 
Brian.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Watch out!
Screeeech!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Phew, too close for comfort.

text_block_list.name: Shopper's Child
text_block_list.text: Sniffle… Uwaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hey! Don't you know to look both ways before crossin' the road?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Good ol' Hishiama will keep an eye on ya, so this time watch out for 
cars, huh?

text_block_list.name: Shopper's Child
text_block_list.text: Sniffle… Thanks, Miss…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Nice moves, Amazon.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What? I wouldn't be a good dorm leader if I didn't watch out for the 
kids. Now… back to our talk.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'd love to race you out on the track. A battle to see who's really the 
strongest! Sounds awesome, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: One day we'll race each other, so don't go runnin' away on me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'd never run from a race, but I have no intention of waiting. If you 
want it so bad, you'll have to keep up.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Heh, that's the spirit! Anyway, I'm gonna hit up the sale on eggs. 
Later!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Okay, Mommy.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, that almost made my heart stop. Seeing her bust that speed 
outta nowhere was even more surprising though!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Have you never seen her race before? It's a sight to behold when she 
charges from the back to the very front near instantaneously.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Some say it's even more shocking to witness than Brian's races.

With Brian on the radar of a racer like her, we're not lacking in worthy 
opponents.

With Brian on the radar of a racer like her, we're not lacking in worthy 
opponents.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
So! We're doing our summer camp at the Mejiro estate. You two 
wanna come?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but I'll have to pass. I got injured before the Takarazuka Kinen, 
so I'll be visiting the hospital.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Awww… That's a shame. Looks like it's just me and you, Hayahide! 
You're in, right?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No, count me out as well.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whaaa?! But there's gonna be fireworks and watermelon and carrots!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I have something that needs attending to.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me you're working on summer homework. Is that what 
you've been scribbling in your notebook?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-what is this?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Muscle and core training… Sprints and ramp… Gate training and pool 
training…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No way, you're gonna do ALL this stuff for summer?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I am. I need to prepare for the races in the fall—both the Sankei Sho 
All Comers and the Tenno Sho (Autumn).

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And finally… I'll hit the Arima Kinen.
